alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Steuben (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:17PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Steuben, northeastern De Kalb and southwestern Williams Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1016 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hamilton, or near Butler, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy downpours will also accompany this storm. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Edon around 1025 PM EDT. Butler around 1030 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Edgerton and Edgerton In Williams County. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 342 and 349. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 155 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
